projects.title: MCV Bus Tender Management System
projects.description: Enterprise tender management system built for MCV (Middle East’s largest bus manufacturer) integrated with Volvo workflows. Enables sales engineers to submit requests reviewed by costing and engineering departments with full approval lifecycle tracking.

projects.title: Performance Management System (PMS)
projects.description: Advanced employee performance evaluation system with KPI tracking, objectives hierarchy, semi-donut ApexCharts visualization, request lifecycle management, and detailed change logs.

projects.title: BOM Generator for Bus Manufacturing
projects.description: Smart Angular application that processes uploaded bus requirement sheets and automatically generates a structured Bill of Materials (BOM). Supports Excel export and macro sheet generation.

projects.title: OR Store Locator System
projects.description: Dynamic city-based store locator for OR brand in Egypt. Built structured navigation between cities and branches with scalable architecture for future expansion.

projects.title: Side Walks - Converse
projects.description: Advanced customization of Shopify theme including dual desktop/mobile images per slide, vertical navigation dots, performance optimization, and responsive redesign.

projects.title: Google Cloud Deployment for Node.js Application for btklmseny website
projects.description: Configured and deployed Node.js application to Google Cloud for connecting the website with the mobile application to provide subscribtion tracking.

projects.title: El Okaby Pharmacies – Shopify E-Commerce Store
projects.description: Designed and customized a professional Shopify store for El Okaby Pharmacies, focused on medical products, cosmetics, and health supplies. Implemented structured category navigation, optimized product pages, mobile-first responsiveness, and performance enhancements to ensure smooth browsing and checkout experience.

projects.title: Zentia – Local Fashion Brand Shopify Store
projects.description: Developed and customized a modern Shopify storefront for Zentia, a local fashion brand. Focused on clean brand presentation, optimized product pages, structured collections, and mobile-first design. Enhanced user experience and streamlined checkout flow to support brand growth and online sales expansion.

projects.title: Hechter – Premium Fashion Shopify Store
projects.description: Customized and optimized Shopify storefront for Hechter, a premium fashion brand. Implemented refined UI enhancements, structured collections, optimized product display, and improved mobile responsiveness to align with the brand’s high-end identity and elevate the shopping experience.
